title: BlazeMeter - Performance Test Results
description: This dashboard provides comprehensive insights, including performance summary, request statistics, and error statistics, showcasing key metrics like response times, throughput, request distribution, error counts, error rates, and failing endpoints.

definition.content:
**[BlazeMeter](https://www.blazemeter.com/)** is a cloud-based performance testing platform that enables scalable load testing for web applications, mobile apps, and APIs.

This dashboard offers comprehensive insights into performance, requests, and errors statistics.

For more information, see the [BlazeMeter Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/blazemeter/).

**Tip**:
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.
